name: Robot Desert Disco Deflector Rave
description:
Created by Nathan Simms and Logan Stuchlik, proud members of Salisbury University's Independent Game Development Club, (the SU Indies)! We love you guys!

The GMTK Jam theme was genre without mechanic. For our submission, we created a twin-stick shooter where you can't fire a shot. Dodge and dash through enemy bullets, deflect them back with your shield, or die! The disco floor will track your health. Dance only if you want to. 
Controller is recommended.

Debug Commands
Escape - Quit
R - Restart

Press Enter to Toggle Keyboard and Mouse Controls.

Press Start to Toggle Gamepad Controls

Keyboard and Mouse
WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
Mouse - Aim
LMB - Deflect
RMB - Dash
Numpad "-" - Toggle Fullscreen

GamePad (Recommended)
Left Stick - Move
Right - Stick - Aim
Right Trigger - Deflect
Left Trigger - Dash
Select - Toggle Fullscreen

All sound effects license free.

Music: Electro-Light - Throwback [NCS Release]
